biotools.summary: COXPRESdb (coexpressed gene database) represents the coexpression relationship for human and mouse. Upgrades include a new comparable coexpression measure, Mutual Rank, five other animal species, rat, chicken, zebrafish, fly and nematoda, and addition of different layers of omics data into the integrated network of genes.
